data.title: Mies climate: Average Temperature by month, Mies water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Mies

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Mies

>>average temperature by month Mies

>>Weather Mies

>>Water temperature Mies

Mies's climate is classified as warm and temperate. In Mies there is a lot of rain even in the driest month. This location is classified as Cfb by Köppen and Geiger. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Mies is 10.4 °C | 50.7 °F, as per the available data. Approximately 1468 mm | 57.8 inch of rainfall occurs on a yearly basis.

The given location is in the northern hemisphere. Summer begins here at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Mies

The least amount of rainfall occurs in February. The average in this month is 106 mm | 4.2 inch. The greatest amount of precipitation occurs in May, with an average of 147 mm | 5.8 inch.

average temperature by month Mies

The temperatures are highest on average in July, at around 19.6 °C | 67.3 °F. The lowest average temperatures in the year occur in January, when it is around 1.6 °C | 34.8 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Mies

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The variation in the precipitation between the driest and wettest months is 41 mm | 2 inch. The variation in temperatures throughout the year is 18.0 °C | 32.4 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (82.36 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (69.72 percent). The month with the most rainy days is May (15.60 days). The month with the fewest rainy days is February (11.27 days).

Mies weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Mies

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Mies, the month that is graced with the most daily hours of sunshine is July. This month sees an average of 10.7 hours of sunshine. In total, there are 331.63 hours of sunshine throughout July.

In Mies, the month that experiences the lowest number of daily sunshine hours is January. The average duration of sunlight during this period amounts to approximately 4.53 hours per day, resulting in a total sum of 140.57 sunshine hours throughout the entire month.

In Mies, the sun shines for an average of 2694.49 hours per year. That comes out to 88.46 hours of sunshine each month.

Water temperature Mies(Lake Geneva)

Max. Water temperature °C (°F) Avg. Water Temperature °C (°F) Min. Water Temperature °C (°F)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

The water temperature in Mies (Lake Geneva) is on an annual average at about 10.70°C | 51.26°F.

In August, the highest water temperature is reached with a monthly average of 21.60°C | 70.88°F. Whereas in February the lowest average water temperatures are expected with about 2.00°C | 35.60°F.

The lowest water temperatures are seen around the year around February 14 at 2.00°C | 35.60°F. The average highest water temperatures are around 21.60°C | 70.88°F and are measured around August 01.

The nearest water to Mies is Lake Geneva.

Airport close to Mies

The closest Airports of Mies are: Geneva International Airport (GVA) 9.92km,Bern Airport (BRN) 121.96km,EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg (BSL) 177.04km

You can reach Mies from this Cities by Plane: London (LCY), Athens (ATH), Copenhagen (CPH), Vienna (VIE), Paris (ORY), Edinburgh (EDI), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (OSL), Alicante (ALC), Liverpool (LPL), Málaga (AGP), Beijing (PEK), Faro (FAO), Funchal (FNC), Porto (OPO), Casablanca (CMN), Stockholm (ARN), Kyiv (KBP), Minsk (MSQ)
